name: Ambition
description: Ambition is a 2D strategy RPG game that explores a village with teleporters to dangerous dungeons. In this strange and quirky world, battle bosses like a one-eyed turtle with a fancy tophat, a giant centipede that lurks quietly in the desert, and many more!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: ntel Core i3 2.3GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: INTEL HD Graphics 530 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Ideal resolution is 1920x1080
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
